subject: Loader constraints
msgSnippet: I m running my testcases using JUnit and I m getting the following error java.lang.LinkageError: Class junit/framework/TestResult violates loader constraints:
messageBody:
I'm running my testcases using JUnit and I'm getting the following
error
java.lang.LinkageError: Class junit/framework/TestResult violates
loader constraints: parent and child already loaded different classes

I did a search in this group and I did not find a questions similar
to this problem.

Unfortunately in junit.org there is no search capability (at least I
did not find one).

Any ideas what could be wrong?

Thanks,
